entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Azure Pipelines / runtime (Formatting windows x64) fails #61331
  • Installed .NET 6.0 and RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription property is returning incorrect version. #61330
  • [DllImportGenerator] Update `GeneratedDllImportAttribute` handling of character set / encoding #61326
    7.0.0
  • CryptoStream calling flush when only reads have been performed #61325
  • dictionaryexpansion tests failing on Mono #61322
  • Regex Source generator is not currently part of the .NETCore ref-pack #61321
  • XSD.exe does not work with .NET Core assemblies #61319
  • MaxBy inconsistent results with tie-breaks #61317
  • [Discussion] Setting config values in `IConfigurationSection` #61314
  • Unable to get EMSDK version when evaluating NativeFileReference in nuget package props or targets #61306
  • HTTPListener may not close the TCP port properly after Exception #61303
  • CertificateRequestChainTests tests may be subject to DST "fall back" spurious failures #61302
  • Writing files on a thread which are already open for reading on a different thread fails. #61301
  • Test failure Interop/PInvoke/Generics/GenericsTest/GenericsTest.sh #61300
  • Test failure Loader/classloader/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion/DictionaryExpansion.sh #61299

Closed

  • CngKey.IsMachineKey is always false #45759
    Future
  • ValidateInterfaceImplTable enforces bogus ordering rules #60454
    7.0.0
  • Does the TPL Dataflow support the ImmediateTaskScheduler? #61318
  • TypeLoadException: The generic type '<>A{00000004}`3' was used with an invalid instantiation in assembly 'kktsxund.iql, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null'. #61316
  • [Blazor WASM VS 2022 Preview] Breakpoints not being hit in Visual Studio #61310
  • [MonoVM] crash when call internal call function duration `mono_runtime_delegate_invoke` #61253
  • Add direct support for structs when deserializing with System.Text.Json.Serialization #61264
  • Infrastructure - Rollout (November 2021) #60826
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix format.py to use jit-format.exe, not jit-format.bat #61334
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix binplacing for (impl) System.Security.Cryptography.Encoding.dll #61333
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix: add missed open curly #61332
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Reflection, 6.0.0
  • Adding Regex source generator to Microsoft.netcore.app.ref pack #61329
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Add task marshaling tests. #61324
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Revert "[wasm] Re-enable source generator tests failing due to OOM (#60701) #61323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Remove WasmBuildTemplate #61315
    area-Build-mono
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Add test for ignoring stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [TEST ONLY] Test stress build refactor #61311
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [release/6.0][mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` (#6… #61305
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add RIDs for MIRACLE LINUX 8 #61304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix: add missed open curly #61320
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Remove sorting requirement for interface lists #60541
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] accept empty realm for digest auth (#56369) #61203
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 5.0.13
  • Type key hash tweaks. #61234
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Removing `m_hostAssemblyMap` and ceremony around it #61292
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix value numbering of field assignments #61113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable global constant propagation for `GT_LCL_FLD` #61209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Implement tailcalls #59799
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • [arm64] JIT: Enable CSE/hoisting for "arrayBase + elementOffset" #61293
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Explicitly mark tests with CLRTestKind=SharedLibrary #61235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [WIP] Enable stress log on Linux #61123
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add instructions for using Codespaces #60996
    area-Infrastructure
  • Provide PEM implementations for AsymmetricAlgorithm. #61284
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Add additional steps in gcc validation leg #61241
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1459821 #61274
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Alternative fix of #60182 #60298
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix evaluation of a static class attribute; using current namespace for evaluation #61252
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: extend redundant relop to handle side effects #61275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only run source-index on main branch. #61271
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix for #60532 #61240
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Re-enable Windows test that verifies DriveInfo.VolumeLabel setter fails on SUBST'd drive #59850
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use conditional statement instead of switch in System.Linq.Enumerable #61215
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Don't create a COM weak reference if the object is an aggregated COMWrappers RCW. #61283
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61289
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Proper VNs for zeroed structs #61285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Optimize System.Diagnostics.TraceSource #60464
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Convert concatenation string to interpolation for System.Private.Xml #60057
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Use diffed bytes for jit-analyze and print more info #61254
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Fix issue #60543 #60544
    area-System.Xml
  • [wasm] Run AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #59479
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, Future
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add System.Diagnostics.StackFrame.GetMethodInfoFromNativeIP API for VS4Mac #61298
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Build improvements #61276
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Question: Rewriting signatures to include the shadow stack #1708

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] : Add support for more helpers #1683
  • Merge from dotnet/runtime #1707
    area-NativeAOT

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Support for more unary and binary ops #1705

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet publish does not include any of dependencies referenced in project #22511
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET SDKs. #22508
  • dotnet sln [solution] add [project] creates debug only configuration #22507
  • Extend runtimeconfig.json with preferred dotnet install locations #22505
  • Binaries for v3.1.415 unavailable #22504
  • template does not support file scoped namespace declaration #22503
  • dotnet build Access to the path '/.dotnet' is denied for Linux, my user is nobody #22502

Closed

  • Finish System.CommandLine updates and ports #22312
    6.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #22510
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22501
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on 5.0.4xx #20865
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Port to 6.0.2xx] Update System.CommandLine version #22351
    Area-CLI
  • Cleanup NoWarn duplication by moving its handling to the Suppression Engine #22426
    Area-Compatibility
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22460
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Treat SDK previews as separate workload feature bands #22446
    Area-Workloads
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Rocky Linux support #21029
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Argument BC(--r/--a) for `dotnet test` for 7.0 #22497
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Coming Soon] Require .NET 6 GA SDK for Roslyn development #57638
  • Completion for static members incorrectly references nullable static type. #57636
  • C# 9 => C# 10 upgrade causing CS0411 with an extension method #57630
    17.1
  • C# compiler, VS: Incorrect error "Operator '?' cannot be applied to operand of type 'TValue'" #57629
    17.1
  • .NET 6.100 The call is ambiguous between the following methods or properties breaking change #57627
    17.1

Closed

  • IOp api indicates conversion operation where none should exist. #56953
    17.1
  • [Complete] Require .NET 6 RC2 SDK for Roslyn development #57282
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails for InitializerExpressionSyntax if it is a child of an ArrayCreationExpressionSyntax #57572
    17.1
  • [Flaky Test] Roslyn.VisualStudio.IntegrationTests.CSharp.CSharpBuild.BuildWithCommandLine Test Failure #18204
    Backlog
  • CS1666 when creating a span from a stack-only buffer #57583
  • Is it correct to use Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel6.0 in the current net5.0 project? #57625
  • MicroBenchmark for InheritanceMarginGlyph #56481
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve error reporting around conditional access. #57640
    Area-Compilers
  • Move completion management logic into QueueItem #57639
    Area-IDE
  • Use the .NET 6.0 SDK for building #57637
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57635
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Overload resolution was ignoring HasTypeArgumentInferredFromFunctionType for calls in expanded form #57633
    Area-Compilers
  • Move hte dependent checksum computation directly into the CompilationTracker component #57632
    Area-IDE
  • Don't throw when cancelled #57631
    Area-IDE
  • Tiny simplification to the compilation tracker. #57628
    Area-IDE
  • Port BasicAddMissingReference.InvokeSomeFixesInVisualBasicThenVerifyReferences to the new test framework #57626
    Area-IDE
  • Compare arrow expression clauses when they are children of properties or indexers #57624
  • Don't analyze local function bodies as though they are top level code #57623
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Initial fix for issue "VB Formatting of LineContinuation Wrong after _ ' Comment" #54559
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57603
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Target executable projects and remote workspaces to net6.0 #57567
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • AbstractFlowPass - VisitArrayCreation should use the regular way for visiting `initializer`. #57612
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57634
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57605
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP]Re-enable information level logging in loghub now that VS supports de… #57588
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #57604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #57602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Re-enable BuildWithCommandLine test #57584
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Next
  • Update VS editor package version #57601
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #57641
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Move the task completion source for a queue item into the queue item itself. #57617
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • Telemetry improvements #57406
    Area-Interactive, UX Review Not Required
  • When we're loading dependencies, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix C# language name in spec #57427
    Area-Compilers
  • Document why we have -vs-deps branches #41153
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation
  • Use helpers in param-nullchecking emit #57615
    Area-Compilers
  • Add undo support for Remove Unused References. #55356
    Area-IDE
  • Bump dependencies and version for GA #57573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add new parser/lexer to the StackTraceAnalyzer #57598
    Area-IDE
  • Use MSBuildLocator for tests #57613
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check constraints on lifted operator types #57050
    Area-Compilers
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address some PROTOTYPE markers #57318
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE
  • Error when ref is used on a parameter or return type of an UnmanagedCallersOnly method #57043
    Area-Compilers
  • [Async lightbulb performance] Move suppression fixes to 'Low' priority bucket #56959
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Feature - List Patterns

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio 2022 Blazor project builds and runs successfully but publish fails with System.ArgumentException #38186
  • Builder.WebHost.UseUrls does not seem to override default url #38185
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Build From Source inconsistencies #38181
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation 3.2.21 has broken dependencies on NuGet #38172
  • Single file build time improvement: plaintext, plaintext #38170
  • Startup regression: mapaction #38169
  • Blazor WASM transfer file #38166

Closed

  • [Test failure] Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.FunctionalTests.HtmlGenerationTest.HtmlGenerationWebSite_GeneratesExpectedResults_WithImageData #34599
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Add the KestrelServerOptionsSetup service in ConfigureKestrel() #30468
    7.0-preview1
  • Mvc.Analyzer test code exceeds MAX_PATH #9431
    6.0-docs-infra
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] make Github desktop ignore irrelevent files #38167
  • Windows 7: Blazor-Server CSS hot reload doesn't work #38188
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • ControllerEndpointRoute API Comment Misunderstood #36279
    Discussions
  • Quarantined RedisEndToEndTests #33851
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Startup improvement: mapaction #38052
  • Blazor webassembly debugging when hosting in gRPC Application #38131
  • .NET 6 Blazor typeparam constraints causing compilation error #38041
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compilation errors showing only in generated .razor.g.cs files and not in my code #38069
  • BrowserRefreshServer.WaitForClientConnectionAsync #37974
  • [Blazor webasm] Please provide global way to set JSON serialization settings #38144
  • [Blazor Server .NET 6] Dispose sometimes called after a while (or never) when tab or browser closed #38147
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] make it easier to build projects to electron #38159
  • [asp.net 7] [feature request] [experimental] bring figma sharp to light #38161
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] bring integrations of popular webapp build process #38163
  • Regression: "The path must be absolute." on Linux #38175
  • [asp.net core 7] [Feature Request] Further Compressing Blazor's render html on release build. #38164
  • [asp.net core 7] [feature request] Multi-thread support for blazor #38160
  • [asp.net 7] [feature request] Let's archive more issues and keep ones that's truely active, lower the number of opened issues, for the sake of collaboration #38162
  • Docker compose Linux container error "The path must be absolute." #37876
  • template does not support file scoped namespace declaration #38165
  • CS0103 The name '__builder' does not exist in the current context BlazorAppDebugBug Index.razor.g.cs #21883
  • Dependency conflict when hosting multiple Blazor Webassembly applications. #23133
    Backlog
  • Unable to hit breakpoints for Blazor in VS or the browser #24176
    Backlog
  • Blazor server. Scoped Service created twice outside the @Body. * is bug? * #31278
    Backlog
  • Conflicting assets with the same target path 'service-worker.js'. #37516
  • Blazor Client side not publishing correctly #37535
  • [Blazor rc1 & rc2] 'System.InvalidOperationException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll or 'Microsoft.JSInterop.JSDisconnectedException' in Microsoft.JSInterop.dll #37609
  • Selecting ,Dragging and dropping text in the SummorNote throws 'Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'insertBefore')' Exception #37638
  • Session Value lost only in Chrome after AJAX post #37687
  • This is a matter of how your web server is configured, not about Blazor WebAssembly. #37689
  • Issue with runing dotnet webApp after Edited the Index page #37743
  • Removing lib folder with bootstrap and others, and html Links from template project, continues causing build errors #37711
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core.BadHttpRequestException #37740
  • SPA proxy not loading pls help #37850
  • Slow to load pages post controller completing #37860

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK and baseline #38184
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Consolidate test projects for helix #38183
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Visual Studio 2019 components configuration file #38182
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unskip HtmlGeneration tests #38138
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • fix - Add the `KestrelServerOptionsSetup` service in `ConfigureKestrel()` #38177
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #38143
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Update SDK to 7.0.100-alpha.1.21555.1 #38179
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `16f637f` to `bf0701d` #38174
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Flow ReadAtLeast calls to underlying PipeReader #32568
    area-runtime
  • Adding descriptions in HttpSysOptions #37949
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Fix AppHost pack prebuilt usage in source-build #37760
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ServerNotAvailableException upon EventPipeSession shutting down (appears to be application shutting down) #2356
    6.0.0
  • [dotnet-trace] Display help text for rundown #959
    7.0.0

Updated

  • Document the EventPipeFormat in this repository #804
    7.0.0
  • [Documentation] Document known caveats to diagnostic tools #1737
    7.0.0
  • [Documentation] EventSource documentation improvement #1736
    7.0.0
  • [Regions] Avoid using allocation_started for USE_REGIONS #2483
    7.0.0
  • gcdump fails to collect dump under high load. #2404
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-sos install fails on Apple M1 #2370
    7.0.0
  • Feature: Support Percentiles and multi-dimension metrics in dotnet-counters #2368
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace with EtwSelfDescribingEventFormat produces unreadable events #2367
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-counters in Azure Kudu/Console. #2323
    7.0.0
  • Diposing Stream from EventPipeSession during unit test causes segfault on Linux and OSX #2223
    7.0.0
  • should_check_bgc_mark and fgc_should_consider_object need to be updated for regions #2208
    7.0.0
  • Verify dotnet-dump and createdump work with user namespace remapping #2150
    7.0.0
  • [macos] Shipping dotnet-* tools unsigned #1942
    7.0.0
  • Make sure we are properly publishing bundled-tools symbols #1631
    7.0.0
  • dotnet-trace CLI output doesn't update under low frequency events #474
    Future
  • dotnet tools shouldn't error if no arguments are provided #510
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace on x86_64 ubuntu 21.10 linux does not capture CPU time #2731
    7.0.0
  • dotnet trace collect does not preserve instrumented application's stdout #2729
    7.0.0
  • spurious Carriage-Return (Control M) in linux output #2728
    Future
  • Empty .Net Trace File generated #2654
    7.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace`: WSL2 issues when using `/mnt/c` #2628
    7.0.0
  • Activity Ids not assigned to Activity tracked events when using certain provider strings #2611
    7.0.0
  • `EventSource` should mention some built-in types require special handling #2608
    7.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add support for reporting with pprof's profile.proto format in CLI tools #2563
    7.0.0
  • Binaries are not signed and fail to run on macOS Monterey with .NET 6 ARM64 runtime #2554
    7.0.0
  • [Feature Request] Add flag to WriteDump Apis to hide the entire console. #2736
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Updated

  • Better rundown defaults and parameterization #2732
  • Fix some workflow issues #2720
  • initial pull request for dotnet-trace report (topN feature) #2705
    dotnet-trace

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] No Android Splash screen on API 31 #3306
  • [Bug] Android API 31 RTE fonts #3305
  • [Bug] Border not propagating bindings #3304
  • Unable to use razor files without adding partial class #3301
  • [Enhancement] MauiSplashScreen Video / Animation Support #3300
  • Unable to run MAUI blazor project in Visual Studio 2022 Preview (latest - 11/08/2021) #3303

Closed

  • .NET MAUI Entry Text only use the value assigned not the typed value (VS2022 Preview 7) #3236
  • [Bug] In Entry the textchanged event doesn't work #2719
  • Does MAUI have any plans to make software developed through MAUI run on Windows 7? #3294

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix mismatch date issue in DatePicker #3298
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮

Merged

  • Update the classic Essentials project #3302
  • [Housekeeping] Created settings page in the .NET MAUI Gallery #3247
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Windows] Signal native text changes to Editor #3297
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮

Updated

  • Multi window close #3295
  • WinUI3 Interop for share and file picker #3232
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Remove usage of IsolatedStorage #2710
    area/migration 🚚, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Expand WeakEventManager to Support Delegate #3253
  • [AndroidX.targets] Bump to net6.0-android31.0 AndroidX packages. #2810
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Swap order of ContentProperty and collection checks #3252

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to compare 2 type mappings to be equal #26581
  • Upgrade to 6.0: closing connection leaves SqlLite db file open #26580
  • Move issues from 7.0.0 preview milestones to 7.0.0 after GA #26578
  • update from 5.0.1 to 6.0breaks all SqliteConnection #26574
  • Using Cosmos Db with EfCore and Managed Identity #26573
  • Slow inserts in EF Core after upgrading to .Net 5 #26570
  • Entity temporary values not being generated client side by EF #26567

Closed

  • Help migrating out of `GetColumnName()` removed in .NET 6 #26565

  • Move issues from preview milestones after GA #18820
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Throw error for unhandled derived query root expression #26579
  • Update SDK #26577
    tell-mode

Merged

  • CREATE SEQUENCE for decimal (sql server) #26566
  • fix typo #26575
    community-contribution
  • Fix MigrationsSqliteTest tests #26572

Updated

  • No skipped complex navigation tests #26561
  • Evolve null-checking approach in EFCore #26557
  • [6.0.1] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Clean up on application exit #26529
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1
